# grove doctor: detect stale worktree entry
setup_workspace

mkdir ../.bare/worktrees/orphan-branch
cp $WORK/orphan-gitdir ../.bare/worktrees/orphan-branch/gitdir

! exec grove doctor
stdout 'Git Issues'
stdout 'âœ— Stale worktree entry'
stdout 'orphan-branch'

-- orphan-gitdir --
/nonexistent/path
